title: Be Fascinated - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Depictions of Cruelty   Different Social Status   Empires   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Misunderstandings   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   R-18   Religions   Royalty   Saints   Seduction   Strong Love Interests   Torture   Wealthy Characters
author: Euphonium   유포늄
description:
The Oracle’s Saint was fake, and the fake deserved to be expelled from the sacred temple.

In front of the fragile being who fell into the world without any protection, the first prince of the empire appeared and reached out. She had to hold his hands.

“You don’t have to worry about anything. I’ll take care of you.”

Not knowing that the affectionate man was having thoughts, blinking his eyes and imagining her spreading her legs.

—

I thought it was somewhat strange . When everything collapsed and abandoned her, He appeared as if it had all been organized.

“Why do you keep crying, Dear Saint?”

“….”

“I’m not saying I’m going to kill you.”

The maniac who desires to possess and swallow her all.>
